      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onPictureTaken

        public java.net.URI onPictureTaken()
        Description copied from interface: SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener
        Called when Camera API has finished it's work. That is, photo has been created, but has not been passed for processing into BitmapProcessor.
        Specified by:
        onPictureTaken in interface SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener
        Returns:
        URI, that would be treated as photo ID in future - it would be passed into SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener.onProcessingFinished(java.net.URI, byte[], android.graphics.Bitmap) and SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener.onProcessingFailed(java.net.URI, Exception).

      • onProcessingFinished

        public void onProcessingFinished(java.net.URI dataID,
                        byte[] data,
                        android.graphics.Bitmap thumbnail)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener
        Called when processing was successfully finished.
        Specified by:
        onProcessingFinished in interface SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener
        Parameters:
        dataID - URI aka photo ID; this object was previously returned from SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener.onPictureTaken()
        data - transformed photo as byte array
        thumbnail - small thumbnail of the photo, that could be actually shown on the screen
        See Also:
        SimpleCameraFragment.setThumbnailSize(android.graphics.Point)

      • onProcessingFailed

        public void onProcessingFailed(java.net.URI dataID,
                      java.lang.Exception e)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener
        Called when processing was stopped due to some error.
        Specified by:
        onProcessingFailed in interface SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener
        Parameters:
        dataID - URI aka photo ID; this object was previously returned from SimpleCameraFragment.CameraFragmentListener.onPictureTaken()
        e - fail reason
